author: Staff Reporter
text:
HOPES, a city-based NGO, is organising a one-day workshop, ‘Early financial planning for the newly and recently wedded couples,’ as part of fundraising for the organisation’s projects, on February 13.

According to a release, the workshop aims at professionally equipping newlyweds with financial goal-setting, early wealth creation and knowledge on tools to buy assets and plan their travel among others. The fee will be Rs. 2,000 per couple.

Lunch, tea and materials will be provided. For details, call: 9840173311.
title: Workshop on Feb. 13
